```{r}
M = multiverse()
```


```{multiverse default-m-1, inside = M}
a = branch(a, 
           "1" ~ 1, 
           "2" ~ 2, 
           "3" ~ 3
          )
b = branch(b, 
           "x" %when% (a != 1) ~ "x", 
           "y" ~ "y", 
           "z" ~ "z"
          )
c = branch(c, 
           "4" ~ 4, 
           "5"%when% (b != "z") ~ 5
          )
```
